data.name: VRC PRO Deluxe Cars pack
data.detailed_description:
This VRC PRO Deluxe cars expansion pack gives you the 6 remaining high performance (modified) cars! Excellent choice if you want to take your VRC PRO E-sport experience to the next level!

✓ Expand your cars
✓ Faster cars with full setup options (modified)
✓ Access more online race events & series
✓ Access more multiplayer sessions
✓ Access more time-trial rankings

Having all remaining cars greatly increase your ability to race others in multiplayer and online events, and to keep up with them. VRC Pro cars are modeled with extreme precision, regarding both vehicle dynamics and visual appearance. Virtual Racing Industries has been developing R/C car simulation software for over 14 years, in close cooperation with industry experts and top class test drivers, and that's something you feel in each car we have available for you in VRC Pro.

DELUXE CARS PACK:

  • 1:8 nitro buggy RX (faster & improved buggy)
  • 1:12 electric pan car
  • 1:8 nitro sport car
  • 1:10 nitro touring car
  • 1:8 nitro NASCAR truck
  • 1:10 nitro NASCAR truck
  • PLUS BONUS: faster short course truck car parts:

BONUS SHORT COURSE PARTS:

  • Tekin Pro4 3300kV
  • Tekin Pro4 4000kV
  • Tekin Pro4 4600kV
  • Tekin RX8 speed controller

Your new cars are automatically downloaded by the game, directly after your purchase.

Have fun!


*Your support of the VRC Pro project is much appreciated. By buying this upgrade you enable us to keep developing new cars, new tracks and new game features which make VRC Pro even better than it already is!

data.short_description: This VRC PRO Deluxe cars expansion pack gives you the 6 remaining high performance (modified) cars! ✓ Faster cars with improved control and full setup options ✓ Access more online race events & series, multiplayer sessions and time-trial...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP 3, .Net framework 3.5
  • Processor: Hyperthreaded Intel CPU, AMD Athlon 64 CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB Pixel Shader 2.0 graphics card (nVidia GeForce FX 5600 or ATI Radeon X600)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Soundblaster compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Windows 8, .Net framework 3.5
  • Processor: Multi-core CPU (Intel Core i5 or i7, AMD Phenom II QUAD X4)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB dedicated RAM, Pixel Shader 3.0 graphics card (AMD Radeon HD 5870, nVidia GTX 560)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Soundblaster compatible soundcard
  • Additional Notes: VRC USB adapter or controller, for hosting multiplayer sessions high upstream connection is recommended
